item.title: How to Extend Visa Free Stay in Japan to 6 Months
item.dc:creator: Roman Freeman
item.description: So I went to The National Museum of Modern Art in Tokyo the other day and the painting that has impressed me the most is probably this. “The Base” by Hiroshi Nakamura.

item.title: Can We Stop Wars?
item.dc:creator: Roman Freeman
item.description: Among the ongoing and potentially erupting new conflicts, the question is more actual than ever: can we stop wars?

item.title: The Small Town Which Ruined Russia's Big Plans on Odesa

item.title: The Real Reasons For Frugal Living

item.description: Living frugally or just being cheap? What does living frugally mean in practice? Let's take a closer look.

item.title: How To Learn a Language in a Fun Way

item.description: I learned English and German by myself. The best part? You can too, absolutely for free. Here's how...

item.title: The Ultimate Guide To Life in Germany

item.description: I've survived my 20s living in Germany for 10 years. Here's what to expect.

item.title: What is Freedom? I've been asking myself this question for a while, so I hit the streets of Germany, Japan, Ukraine and other places to ask people what they think.
item.dc:creator: Roman Freeman
